products.title: Scandi Birds Aqua Roman Blind
products.description: One of the most popular colourways from the iliv scandi collection. This bold print is suitable for both traditional and modern homes and is trending in its style. Add a focal point to your windows with this roman blind, handmade in their own west yorkshire factory. Swift direct blinds are proud that their customers voted their roman blinds excellent on trustpilot reviews. Product id: db-rom0902 fabric colour: aqua material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Scandinavia Stripe Aqua Roman Blind
products.description: Teal and white stripes fly across the fabric of this scandinavia stripe aqua roman blind, adding a fun splash of colour to the otherwise natural fabric. This gorgeous blind has a fabulous texture to it, giving it added fullness and depth, while the contemporary colour scheme giv teal and white stripes fly across the fabric of this scandinavia stripe aqua roman blind, adding a fun splash of colour to the otherwise natural fabric.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: A gorgeously fresh design, the scandi birds aqua has a softly energetic appearance, rooted in its contrasting shades of light oatmeal and vibrant aqua blue. The featured birds are sweet and characterful, covered in pretty detailing that adds to the attractiveness of this blind. Bring a quick punch of colour to a neutral hallway or upstairs landing by adding the aqua. Surround it with white walls and accessories in matching oatmeal shades, keeping the scheme light and airy for the perfect welcome.
